docs.snippet: Thierry Henry, who scored in his Red Bulls debut Thursday, is one of a handful of World Cup veterans to join M.L.S. this summer, and the flow of international talent could intensify in the coming days.
docs.lead_paragraph: When Thierry Henry first joined Arsenal in 1999, it took the French striker eight games to score his first goal, the lone strike in a 1-0 win over Southampton on Sept. 18, 1999. Then 22, Henry had most of his career ahead of him. Now, a month before his 33rd birthday, his goal-scoring days are more numbered, so he wasted no time opening his account for his new team. He scored Thursday in his New York Red Bulls debut, an exhibition game against Tottenham Hotspur.
docs.abstract: Thierry Henry, who scored in his Red Bulls debut Thursday, is one of a handful of World Cup veterans to join M.L.S. this summer, and the flow of international talent could intensify in the coming days.

headline.main: Henry's Goal Just the Beginning as M.L.S. Eyes More World Cup Veterans

docs.snippet: The sport of polo is the main draw at a number of hotels.
docs.lead_paragraph: The elite sport of polo has become increasingly accessible to travelers as hotels and resorts have started highlighting lessons and matches as one of their main attractions.
docs.abstract: The sport of polo is the main draw at a number of hotels.

headline.main: Play and Stay at Hotels Featuring Polo

docs.snippet: The elite sport of polo has become increasingly accessible to travelers as hotels and resorts have started highlighting lessons and matches as one of their main attractions.     One of the newest polo destinations is the 12-room Estancia Vik Jose...
docs.lead_paragraph: The elite sport of polo has become increasingly accessible to travelers as hotels and resorts have started highlighting lessons and matches as one of their main attractions. One of the newest polo destinations is the 12-room Estancia Vik Jose Ignacio, near Punta del Este, Uruguay, which opened last year. It offers lessons to all levels on its polo field for $150 an hour. Guests can also catch matches held on the house turf in December and January.
docs.abstract: Some hotels in Uruguay and Argentina are offering polo lessons to guests; St Regis Hotels and Resorts has teamed up with polo star Nacho Figueras to sponsor Web site; photo (M)

headline.main: Guests Can Stay or Play At Resorts Offering Polo
